channel.title: How do i make a npc talk
channel.description: ok i need help making a npc talk i know where to go in the npchandler.java ,and i find the ones being used but how do i make a new 1 where do i copy it at cuse each time its always in the wrong place thank you

item.title: How do i make a npc talk
item.dc:creator: @toxiccorn toxiccorn
item.description:
@toxiccorn wrote:

				if (npcs[i].npcType == 872) {
					if (misc.random2(50) <= 15) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Only great magicians are allowd to use this portal";
					}
				}
				
				<----Paste here before the new if(npcs.[i].npcType == 

				if (npcs[i].npcType == 872) {
					if (misc.random2(25) <= 10) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "This altar can get you powerful magic";
					}
				}
